titleStmt.title: The funerals of the high and mighty Prince Henry, Prince of Wales, Duke of Cornewaile and Rothsay, Count Palatine of Chester, Earle of Carick, and late Knight of the most noble Order of the Garter VVhich noble Prince deceased at St. Iames, the sixt day of Nouember, 1612. and was most princely interred the seuenth day of December following, within the Abbey of Westminster, in the eighteenth yeere of his age.

The funerals of the high and mighty Prince Henry, Prince of Wales, Duke of Cornewaile and Rothsay, Count Palatine of Chester, Earle of Carick, and late Knight of the most noble Order of the Garter VVhich noble Prince deceased at St. Iames, the sixt day of Nouember, 1612. and was most princely interred the seuenth day of December following, within the Abbey of Westminster, in the eighteenth yeere of his age.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] S[nodham] for Iohn Budgde [i.e. Budge], and are to be sould at his shop at the great south dore of Paules, and at Brittanes Bursse,

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-B⁴ C² .
The last page bears a woodcut within a black frame.
Usually found as part 2 of: Chapman, George. An epicede or funerall song: London, 1612.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
